desc.p: This links the PW.ACTIVITY.TXN along with the T24 Application/ version name specified in the Target field of PW.ACTIVITY along with the ID.
This is the key of PW.TXN.REF. The syntax is <T24 Application/version name> :’*’:< ID>
This links the PW.ACTIVITY.TXN along with the T24 Application/ version name specified in the Target field of PW.ACTIVITY along with the ID.
